summary: This document is an email chain between attorneys Daniel J. Kaiser, Kimberly Lerner, and William H. Kaiser, and an Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York, discussing scheduling calls regarding the Epstein case. It references a prior meeting and indicates ongoing coordination between defense counsel and prosecutors.

persons.name: Daniel J. Kaiser
persons.context: Attorney from Kaiser Saurborn & Mair, P.C., communicating with prosecutors about scheduling calls regarding the Epstein case. He is in Boston for a deposition during the exchange.

persons.name: Kimberly Lerner
persons.context: Attorney copied on emails, attending a charity function with limited service, suggesting a call for Monday at 12 PM.

persons.name: William H. Kaiser
persons.context: Attorney copied on emails, thanked for handling a meeting professionally.

connections.description: Both are attorneys copied on the same email chain discussing the Epstein case, coordinating call schedules.
Both are attorneys from the same firm (Kaiser Saurborn & Mair, P.C.) copied on the same email chain.
Daniel J. Kaiser is communicating with an Assistant U.S. Attorney from SDNY regarding scheduling calls about the Epstein case, indicating a prosecutor-defense attorney relationship.

events.title: Prosecutor Request for Call
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney from SDNY emails attorneys Daniel J. Kaiser and Kimberly Lerner requesting a brief call regarding the Epstein case.

events.title: Scheduling Coordination
events.description: Email exchange among attorneys Daniel J. Kaiser, Kimberly Lerner, William H. Kaiser, and an Assistant U.S. Attorney to schedule calls about the Epstein case, with Daniel Kaiser in Boston for a deposition.

events.title: Post-Meeting Follow-up
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney follows up on a meeting held the previous day, providing contact info for the prosecution team and thanking the attorneys for their professionalism.

keyFacts: Attorneys Daniel J. Kaiser, Kimberly Lerner, and William H. Kaiser are involved in communications with the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding the Epstein case.
The email chain shows ongoing coordination and scheduling of calls between defense counsel and prosecutors in July 2019.
A prior meeting between the defense attorneys and the prosecution team occurred, which was followed up on professionally.
Daniel J. Kaiser was in Boston for a deposition during the scheduling discussions.
